int[] result = new int[8];//å…¨å±€æˆ–æˆå‘˜å˜é‡,ä¸‹æ ‡è¡¨ç¤ºè¡Œ,å€¼è¡¨ç¤ºqueenå­˜å‚¨åœ¨å“ªä¸€åˆ—
public void cal8queens(int row) { // è°ƒç”¨æ–¹å¼ï¼šcal8queens(0);
  if (row == 8) { // 8ä¸ªæ£‹å­éƒ½æ”¾ç½®å¥½äº†ï¼Œæ‰“å°ç»“æœ

    if (isOk(row, column)) { // æœ‰äº›æ”¾æ³•ä¸æ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚

      cal8queens(row+1); // è€ƒå¯Ÿä¸‹ä¸€è¡Œ
    }

}

private boolean isOk(int row, int column) {//åˆ¤æ–­rowè¡Œcolumnåˆ—æ”¾ç½®æ˜¯å¦åˆé€‚
  int leftup = column - 1, rightup = column + 1;
  for (int i = row-1; i >= 0; --i) { // é€è¡Œå¾€ä¸Šè€ƒå¯Ÿæ¯ä¸€è¡Œ
    if (result[i] == column) return false; // ç¬¬iè¡Œçš„columnåˆ—æœ‰æ£‹å­å—ï¼Ÿ
    if (leftup >= 0) { // è€ƒå¯Ÿå·¦ä¸Šå¯¹è§’çº¿ï¼šç¬¬iè¡Œleftupåˆ—æœ‰æ£‹å­å—ï¼Ÿ
      if (result[i] == leftup) return false;
    }
    if (rightup < 8) { // è€ƒå¯Ÿå³ä¸Šå¯¹è§’çº¿ï¼šç¬¬iè¡Œrightupåˆ—æœ‰æ£‹å­å—ï¼Ÿ
      if (result[i] == rightup) return false;
    }
    --leftup; ++rightup;
  }
  return true;
}

private void printQueens(int[] result) { // æ‰“å°å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´çŸ©é˜µ
  for (int row = 0; row < 8; ++row) {
    for (int column = 0; column < 8; ++column) {
      if (result[row] == column) System.out.print("Q ");
      else System.out.print("* ");
    }
    System.out.println();
  }
  System.out.println();
}

public int maxW = Integer.MIN_VALUE; //å­˜å‚¨èƒŒåŒ…ä¸­ç‰©å“æ€»é‡é‡çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼

maxW = -1 # tracking the max weight

def backpack(i, cw, items, w):
'''
# i: the ith item, integer
# cw: current weight, integer
# items: python list of item weights
# w: upper limit weight the backpack can load
'''
global maxW

if cw==w or i==len(items): # base case
if cw > maxW:
maxW = cw
return

# There are 2 states, traverse both!!!
backpack(i+1, cw, items, w) # do not choose
if (cw + items[i] <= w):
backpack(i+1, cw+items[i], items, w) # choose

# how to use
items = [2, 2, 4, 6, 3]
backpack(0, 0, items, 10)
print(maxW)

function cal8Queens($row) {

function printQueens($result) { // æœ‰çš‡åçš„ä½ç½®æ‰“å°1 å…¶ä»–ä¸º 0

function isOk($row,$column) { // åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰è¡Œåˆ—æ˜¯å¦åˆé€‚
global $result;
$leftUp = $column - 1;
$rightUp = $column + 1;

// å¾€ä¸Šè€ƒå¯Ÿæ¯ä¸€è¡Œ
for ($i = $row - 1;$i >= 0;$i--) {
if ($result[$i] == $column) { // å½“å‰åˆ—è€ƒå¯Ÿ
return false;

if ($leftUp >= 0) {

return false;
}
}

// å³ä¸Šå¯¹è§’
if ($rightUp < 8) {
if ($result[$i] == $rightUp) {
return false;
}
}
--$leftUp;
++$rightUp;
}
return true;
}

class Knapsack {

private lateinit var itemValueArr: Array<Int>

//è®°å½•é€‰ä¸­äº†å“ªå‡ ä¸ªç‰©å“
private lateinit var result: Array<Int>
private var maxValue = 0
private var maxSelectedIndexStr = ""

/**
* è®¡ç®—èƒŒåŒ…é—®é¢˜
*
* @param itemWeightArr ç‰©å“çš„é‡é‡
* @param itemValueArr æ¯ä¸ªç‰©å“çš„ä»·å€¼
* @param totalWeight èƒŒåŒ…èƒ½å¤Ÿå®¹çº³çš„æ€»é‡é‡
*/
fun calc(itemWeightArr: Array<Int>, itemValueArr: Array<Int>, totalWeight: Int) {
this.itemWeightArr = itemWeightArr
this.itemValueArr = itemValueArr
this.totalWeight = totalWeight
this.maxValue = 0
result = Array(itemWeightArr.size) { -1 }
calcRecursive(0, 0, 0, "")
}

/**
* é€’å½’è®¡ç®—
*
* @param index è¡¨ç¤ºå¼€å§‹æ”¾ç¬¬å‡ ä¸ªç‰©å“
* @param currWeight è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰èƒŒåŒ…çš„ç‰©å“æ€»é‡
* @param currValue è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰èƒŒåŒ…çš„ç‰©å“æ€»ä»·å€¼
*/
private fun calcRecursive(index: Int, currWeight: Int, currValue: Int, currSelectedStr: String) {
if (index >= itemWeightArr.size || currWeight == this.totalWeight) {
if (currValue > this.maxValue) {
this.maxValue = currValue
this.maxSelectedIndexStr = currSelectedStr
}
return
}

//å½“å‰ç‰©å“ä¸æ”¾
result[index] = 0
calcRecursive(index + 1, currWeight, currValue, currSelectedStr)
//å½“å‰ç‰©å“æ”¾è¿›å»
if (itemWeightArr[index] + currWeight <= this.totalWeight) {
result[index] = 1
calcRecursive(index + 1, itemWeightArr[index] + currWeight,
itemValueArr[index] + currValue, "${currSelectedStr}${if (currSelectedStr.isEmpty()) "" else ","}${index}")
}
}

fun getMaxValue(): Int {
println(this.maxSelectedIndexStr)
return this.maxValue
}
}

public static boolean match(CharSequence text, int ti, CharSequence pattern, int pi) {
if (pi == pattern.length()) return ti == text.length();

int j = pi, i = ti;
while (i < text.length()) {
char c = text.charAt(i);
char p = pattern.charAt(j);
if (p == '*') {
for (int k = i; k <= text.length(); k++) {
if (match(text, k, pattern, j + 1)) {
return true;
}
}
} else if (p == '?') {
return match(text, i, pattern, j + 1) || match(text, i + 1, pattern, j + 1);
} else if (p == c) {
j++;
i++;
if (j == pattern.length()) return i == text.length();
continue;
}
break;
}

return false;
}

class Solution:
def isOk(self, n, row, col, q):
for i in range(len(q)):
if q[i][0] == row or q[i][1] == col:
return False
if abs(q[i][0] - row) == abs(q[i][1] - col):
return False
return True

def place(self, n, row, q): # qä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªstackç”¨æ¥ä¿å­˜æ¯ä¸€è¡Œçš„Qå·¦è¾¹
if row == n:
l = []
for i in range(len(q)):
l.append(q[i][1] * '.' + 'Q' + '.' * (n - q[i][1] - 1))
self.res.append(l)
return

for i in range(n):
if self.isOk(n, row, i, q): # åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰åæ ‡èƒ½ä¸èƒ½æ”¾
q.append((row, i))
self.place(n, row + 1, q)
q.pop()

def solveNQueens(self, n: int) -> List[List[str]]:
self.res = []
self.place(n, 0, [])
return self.res

public class OneOrZeroPackageWithMoney {

public static class Thing {
int weight;

public Thing(int weight, int money) {

this.money = money;
}
}

public static int maxW = Integer.MIN_VALUE; //å­˜å‚¨èƒŒåŒ…ä¸­ç‰©å“æ€»é‡é‡çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼
public static int maxValue = Integer.MIN_VALUE; //å­˜å‚¨èƒŒåŒ…ä¸­ç‰©å“æœ€å¤§ä»·å€¼

/**

* itemsè¡¨ç¤ºæ¯ä¸ªç‰©å“çš„é‡é‡
* nè¡¨ç¤ºç‰©å“ä¸ªæ•°;
* wèƒŒåŒ…é‡é‡ï¼›
* å‡è®¾èƒŒåŒ…å¯æ‰¿å—é‡é‡100ï¼Œç‰©å“ä¸ªæ•°10ï¼Œç‰©å“é‡é‡å­˜å‚¨åœ¨æ•°ç»„aä¸­ï¼Œé‚£å¯ä»¥è¿™æ ·è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°ï¼š
* f(0, 0, a, 10, 100)

public static void f(int i, int cw, int value, Thing[] items, int n, int w) {
if (cw == w || i == n) { // cw==wè¡¨ç¤ºè£…æ»¡äº†;i==nè¡¨ç¤ºå·²ç»è€ƒå¯Ÿå®Œæ‰€æœ‰çš„ç‰©å“

}

}
f(i + 1, cw, value, items, n, w);//å½“å‰ç‰©å“ä¸è£…è¿›èƒŒåŒ…

}

}

boolean isOk(int row, int column) {
for (int i = 0; i < row; i++) {
if (column == result[i]) return false;
if (row == column - (result[i] - i)) return false;
if (row == result[i] + i - column) return false;
}

return true;
}

- (void)cal8Queen:(NSInteger)r {
if (r < 0) {
// å¦‚æœæ‰€æœ‰è¡Œå·²ç»éƒ½å›æº¯è¿‡äº† ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ä¸èƒ½è®¡ç®—å³å¯
printf("there is no naswer for queen number %ld", (long)self.queenNum);
printf("\n");

}
if (r == self.queenNum) {
[self printResult];
return;
}

BOOL setted = NO;
NSInteger i = r < self.array.count ? [self.array[r] integerValue] + 1 : 0;

if (i >= self.queenNum) {
// å¦‚æœå½“å‰è¡Œå·²ç»æ²¡æœ‰å¯é€‰äº† å›æº¯å‰ä¸€è¡Œ
[self.array removeLastObject];
[self cal8Queen:--r];
return;
}
for (; i < self.queenNum; i++) {
if ([self isOK:r c:i]) {
self.array[r] = @(i);
[self cal8Queen:++r];
setted = YES;
break;
}
}
if (!setted) {
// å¼€å§‹å›æº¯
[self cal8Queen:--r];
}
}
